title: TVLine Items: A Simple Favor Sequel Trailer, Max Nixes Sports Fee and More
description: Blake Lively is just asking for Another Simple Favor. In a newly released teaser trailer for Prime Video’s sequel to the 2018 movie A Simple Favor, “Stephanie Smothers (Anna Kendrick) and Emily Nelson (Lively) reunite on the beautiful island of Capri, Italy, for Emily’s extravagant wedding to a rich Italian businessman,” reads the official synopsis. […]
author: Vlada Gelman
excerpt: Blake Lively is just asking for 'Another Simple Favor' in a newly released teaser trailer for Prime Video's sequel to 'A Simple Favor' — watch it now!
text: TVLine Items: A Simple Favor Sequel Trailer, Max Nixes Sports Fee and MoreBlake Lively is just asking for Another Simple Favor. In a newly released teaser trailer for Prime Video‘s sequel to the 2018 movie A Simple Favor, “Stephanie Smothers (Anna Kendrick) and Emily Nelson (Lively) reunite on the beautiful island of Capri, Italy, for Emily’s extravagant wedding to a rich Italian businessman,” reads the official synopsis. And who does Emily want to be her unlikely maid of honor? Stephanie, of course! “Along with the glamorous guests, expect murder and betrayal to RSVP for a wedding with more twists and turns than the road from the Marina Grande to the Capri town square,” the description touts. Another Simply Favor will be released Thursday, May 1 on Prime Video. Ready for some more recent newsy nuggets? Well… * Max’s B/R Sports Add-On will remain available at no additional cost to Standard and Premium tier subscribers in the U.S., the streamer announced on Wednesday. * Patrick Wilson (Fargo, Girls) has joined Amy Adams and Javier Bardem in the cast of Apple TV+’s upcoming adaptation of the thriller Cape Fear. * Netflix has renewed the wilderness competition series Outlast for Season 3, our sister site Deadline reports. * Netflix has released a teaser for the movie Fear Street: Prom Queen, premiering Friday, May 23: * Netflix has released a trailer for reality competition Million Dollar Secret, wherein 12 strangers enter a sumptuous lakeside estate and in each of their rooms is a mysterious welcome gift — a box. Eleven of them are empty and one contains $1,000,000, and it’s for that guest to keep — as long as they keep their identity hidden. The first three episodes drop Wednesday, March 26. Which of today’s TVLine Items pique your interest?
html:
TVLine Items: A Simple Favor Sequel Trailer, Max Nixes Sports Fee and More

Blake Lively is just asking for Another Simple Favor.

In a newly released teaser trailer for Prime Video‘s sequel to the 2018 movie A Simple Favor, “Stephanie Smothers (Anna Kendrick) and Emily Nelson (Lively) reunite on the beautiful island of Capri, Italy, for Emily’s extravagant wedding to a rich Italian businessman,” reads the official synopsis. And who does Emily want to be her unlikely maid of honor? Stephanie, of course!

“Along with the glamorous guests, expect murder and betrayal to RSVP for a wedding with more twists and turns than the road from the Marina Grande to the Capri town square,” the description touts.

Another Simply Favor will be released Thursday, May 1 on Prime Video.

Ready for some more recent newsy nuggets? Well…

* Max’s B/R Sports Add-On will remain available at no additional cost to Standard and Premium tier subscribers in the U.S., the streamer announced on Wednesday.

* Patrick Wilson (Fargo, Girls) has joined Amy Adams and Javier Bardem in the cast of Apple TV+’s upcoming adaptation of the thriller Cape Fear.

* Netflix has renewed the wilderness competition series Outlast for Season 3, our sister site Deadline reports.

* Netflix has released a teaser for the movie Fear Street: Prom Queen, premiering Friday, May 23:

* Netflix has released a trailer for reality competition Million Dollar Secret, wherein 12 strangers enter a sumptuous lakeside estate and in each of their rooms is a mysterious welcome gift — a box. Eleven of them are empty and one contains $1,000,000, and it’s for that guest to keep — as long as they keep their identity hidden. The first three episodes drop Wednesday, March 26.

Which of today’s TVLine Items pique your interest?
